int runAndWait (bool deleteThread=true, bool hourGlass=true)

Reimplemented from Thread.

int runAndWait (  bool  deleteThread = true,
bool  hourGlass = true
)  [inherited]
 

Thread::runAndWait() may call the code again from where it has been called, since regular event queue handling takes place.

Beware of this fact when using this method. Maybe you require guard flags to prevent duplicate (inner) execution of your code.
